page.title: 06CLUBS, EAST BARKWITH
page.content: There are several clubs in the area. The {Youth Club}meets on Mondays during the winter time.You can join when you go to the Secondary School. It meets in East Barkwith. East Barkwith{Women's Institute}meets monthly, it has about 30 members,as does Hainton {W.I.}which meets in South Willingham. The {Cubs }meet every Tuesday in term-time, in the cub hut in summer and the Village Hall in winter. There are 11 Cubs. The { {Gardener's Association}meets monthly in the winter. They have a daffodil show in spring and a flower, vegetable and cookery Show in September, which anyone can enter. The {Over 60s} go round the seven villages in our parish, which include East Barkwith and South Willingham. They have monthly meetings and go on trips.
